title: By the Queene whereas the Queenes Maiestie our soueraigne lady by reason of the plague and pestilence in the citie of London   dyd lately by her proclamation adiourne part of the tearme of S. Michael ...    Her Maiestie is therefore forced ... to adiourne the rest of the said tearme    ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: Imprinted at London in Powles Churchyarde by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill] ... ,
